GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
macvlan: enforce a consistent minimal mtu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 650137a7c0b2892df2e5b0bc112d7b09a78c93c8, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit 91572088e3fdbf4fe31cf397926d8b890fdb3237. For more details please see the references link.
